description: Tommy and Kenny have been friends for a few years now and routinely go out hunting together...hunting girls that is.</br></br>They just arrived in Canada to try their luck hunting in foreign country for a few weeks. Sitting around in cold weather has really gotten to these two and they decide to unload together before going out for a night on the town, and we decided to film them. These two chiseled studs undress and pull out their thick cocks and get down to business just like they are the only two in the room. Good thing for you they weren't. </br></br>Enjoy!
title: Jerking Off With A Friend
